classScheduleInformation: Students must register for one discussion and one lecture section.
courseSectionInformation: Credit is not given for both EPS 202 and EPS 201. Prerequisite: Completion of campus Composition I general education requirement.
description: Course is identical to EPS 201 except for the additional writing component. Credit is not given for both EPS 202 and EPS 201. Prerequisite: Completion of campus Composition I general education requirement.
